posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jimi
I'm looking to grab any/all Abbaticchio T206s (either Brown or Blue sleeved) cards.  I prefer low to midgrade and I want any/all different backs.  Not looking to get duplicate backs.  I do not have any right now, so any will work.  I'd like to request scans from you via e-mail if possible, especially the backs.  Thanks!

Jimi

Posted By: raymond g.
